Reviews.Title: I do like blackberry
Reviews.Author: Ang
Reviews.Content: I bought this bb cuz I dropped mine in the lake and since I love blacberry i bought another one.  It arrived quickly as specified.  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: i dont like it
Reviews.Author: fernando
Reviews.Content: i dont like this black berry i hoped much better! and u have one question if a dont want it any more can i sell to you ?

ProductInfo.Features:
3G-enabled BlackBerry smartphone with full QWERTY keyboard and touch-sensitive optical trackpad
Sprint Mobile Broadband Network via EV-DO connectivity; Sprint TV and Sprint Music Store enabled
2-megapixel camera/camcorder; Bluetooth stereo music; microSD memory expansion; digital audio player syncs with iTunes and Windows Media Player
Up to 5.4 hours of talk time
Clear ESN , Ready To Activate, No Contract Required
ProductInfo.Name: RIM BlackBerry Curve 2 8530, Sprint (RED) CDMA Only - No Contract Required- QWERTY
